phrs.translation: 美妙的, 甜美的, 糖浆似的

sentences.sentence: Due to bad food habits (sugars) our blood gets sticky and syrupy.
sentences.translation: 是不良的饮食习惯(糖类)使我们的血液变得像糖浆般粘稠。

sentences.sentence: NREL USES syrupy liquids which contain salty desiccants to soak up the humidity.
sentences.translation: NREL使用一种含盐干燥剂的糖浆式液体吸走湿气。

sentences.sentence: NREL uses syrupy liquids which contain salty desiccants to soak up the humidity.
sentences.translation: NREL使用含有干燥剂的浆状液体来降低空气湿度，然后利用热水加热浆状液体并使其干燥。
